entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Indin River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:44 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 33. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Clearing this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 33. Wind chill minus 46 this morning and minus 39 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 40.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 40. Wind chill minus 45 this evening and minus 54 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022
